name: Snapic
description:
Snapic is a game where you have a brand new social media page called Snapic!

You have 30 days until your party begins. Try to gain the most amount of followers within that time, just don't go overboard!

Controls: Just your mouse no need for a keyboard (who uses a keyboard anyways?).

Snapic was made by a group of three.
Artists: Rob and Squadala https://www.deviantart.com/iamsquadala
Programmers: Myself

This game was made as part of the Ludum Dare 43 Game Jam.
